description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Caramel Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate Caramel Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Melt chocolate with oil in a heatproof bowl over a pan of simmering water. Spread chocolate over caramel layer and refrigerate until set. Cut into squares. Note: Melt chocolate over boiling simmer water and keep stirring so it doesn't burn.
